Enter the name of the person you want to write to
Enter the name of another friend
If the friend is male, enter an 'm', or enter an 'f'
Please enter the age of the person you want to write to
Dear Bob,
  How are you? I am fine. I miss you.
  Have you seen Alice lately? If you see Alice please ask her to call me.
  Next year you will be able to vote.
Yours sincerely,


ZZy
